page.title: 12Education
page.content: All children can use the large library which was built by money raised by the parents and Teachers Association.It is a large room built onto one of the outside walls.It is lined with shelves full of books for the youngest children and for the children with reading ages of 14+. There are comfortable arm chairs and a well stocked non-fiction section with many reference books. The infants spend the afternoon with environmental study work. They are taken on school visits to firestations,bakeries,police stations and other places of interest.Upon return they write about their experiences,paint pictures,make card board models,and explore the visit through movement,music,drama,and science.
